net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler

Interface UiEventObserver


  • public interface UiEventObserver
    This is the interface for an observer, that gets notified before and after one or multiple UiHandler(s) get invoked.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    AttributeWriteEventObserver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterHandler(UiEvent event)
      This method is called after the UiHandler(s) are invoked.
      void beforeHandler(UiEvent event)
      This method is called before the UiHandler(s) are invoked.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeHandler

        void beforeHandler(UiEvent event)
        This method is called before the UiHandler(s) are invoked.
        Parameters:
        event - is the event that is going to be send to all registered event listeners.

      • afterHandler

        void afterHandler(UiEvent event)
        This method is called after the UiHandler(s) are invoked.
        Parameters:
        event - is the event that has been send to all registered event listeners.
